name: The Silver Spoon - 2019 Community Game Jam
name_original: The Silver Spoon - 2019 Community Game Jam
description: The Silver Spoon is a 2D action/arcade game that was heavily inspired by the Hotline Miami franchise.  It was originally created for the 2019 Community Game Jam and will later receive a fresh coat of paint before an official release is made.  You play as Spoon, a "Cereal Killer" set out to vanquish his foes.  In order to complete this mission you must earn 5000 points to successfully escape.  Are you up for the challenge?
